remarks: A monoid has a two-sided identity element.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-2011.)
statement:
mndcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mndcl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
mndid $p |- ( G e. Mnd -> E. u e. B A. x e. B ( ( u .+ x ) = x /\ ( x .+ u ) = x ) ) $.
$d .+ u x $.
$d .+ x $.
$d B u x $.
$d B x $.
$d G u x $.
$d G x $.
